creator: christ1

content:
First, I am only a volunteer, but I would be surprised to see the equivalent of Format Painter added. But, Thunderbird is very flexible, allowing for strong HTML support or plain text support. In a prior post, I summarized the steps. Here is link to that post: 

 https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1462509

If you do extensive cutting and pasting for HTML messages, it can get messy regardless of the email client used. that is because HTML is just a markup language. If you encounter that a lot, I suggest installing this addon, ThunderHTMLedit, from https://www.betterbird.eu/addons/ no other HTML editor comes close.

david
creator: davidsk

content: Please be specific on the exact things you did. Renaming the system folder, creating a new folder, and reintegrating the accounts is too vague for us know exactly what you did. In referring to the system folder, I presume you meant the appdata\roaming\thunderbird folder, but maybe you meant the profile folder. Again, specifics will help. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: Sehr unklare Beschreibung des Problems. Weshalb wurde "Systemordner Thunderbird" umbenannt? Welche Sicherungen welcher deiner Daten hast du durchgeführt? Funktioniert dein neues Profil wieder? Falls ja, was möchtest du von uns wissen?
